text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea lamellata (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, White Meranti) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is a tree found in Sumatra and Peninsular Malaysia.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea lamellata". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31971A9671513. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31971A9671513.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
